reviewtext: For a younger person with perfect hearing these might have less fidelity than others.  However, these are extremely comfortable.  The isolation from the outside noise is better than most other ear bud style phones.  And, they don't have the fall out problems associated with typical ear buds.  Koss, "Sparkplug" earphones are also worth consideration.  The Sparkplug model earphones sound about the same, but have a little higher profile out of ones ear.
